sqlmap.create: CREATE TABLE `?` ( `#{primaryKey}` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`#{primaryKey}`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sqlmap.listcolumn: SELECT a.attributeId,a.columnname,a.attributeName,a.dataInitValue,w.widgetValue,w.datatype,c.Tablename,a.isTableDisplay FROM ResAttributes a,ResCiTypeAttribute c,ResWidgetType w WHERE a.attributeid = c.AttributeId and a.widgetId = w.widgetId and c.Tablename in (?) order by c.Tablename asc,c.AttributeIndex asc
sqlmap.list: select #{select}, (select count(ID) from ResCiUserAttentionRelation where UserID = #{userId} and ResCiID = ResCi.CiId) attention_count, (SELECT u.userName FROM SysUserInfo u WHERE u.UserID = ResCi.userId) AS user_name, (SELECT u.userName FROM SysUserInfo u WHERE u.UserID = ResCi.MaintainerId) AS maintainer_name, (SELECT d.DeptName FROM SysDepartment d WHERE d.DeptID = ResCi.DepartmentId) AS department_name, (select pro.Title from Project pro where ResCi.ProjectId = pro.ID) projectName from ResCi ResCi LEFT JOIN ResTypeDefine ResTypeDefine on ResCi.CiTypeid=ResTypeDefine.ResTypeID left join ResAsset ResAsset on ResAsset.ConfigurationItemId=ResCi.CiId LEFT JOIN ResAssetType ResAssetType ON ResAsset.AssetTypeId = ResAssetType.ID #{left-join} #{where} #{condition2} order by ResCi.CiId desc
